name: Companies included in the survey that were not in the original sampling frame: 2008–20
description: Companies included in the survey that were not in the original sampling frame: 2008–20

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Beginning in survey year 2019, counts reflect a change in rounding methodology. This table shows the counts of companies that were found during the update procedures, were added to each year's sample, and were mailed a survey letter. These company counts are not in table A-2.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey.
